A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not terrible\, has some good moments\, but it does a disservice to the old fans and  the original trilogy.  Disney is pushing this new story line and is focused on a new character line instead of integrating the old and the new and then transitioning slowly to the new characters.  To quote the movie\, \"kill the past\"\, that is what they are doing to Star Wars and half the fans.
